Chinese D2
China: a flash expulsion for Yaya Toure
Currently in the second division of China, the midfielder has been talking about him in a questionable way.
02 Nov 2019, 16:40 by Thomas Rassouli



Discover the possible team lineup of the Citizens for the upcoming season, who dream of winning a third straight title in the Premier League.Icon Sport



EdersonIcon Sport



Kyle WalkerIcon Sport



Aymeric LaporteIcon Sport



John StonesIcon Sport



Benjamin MendyIcon Sport



FernandinhoIcon Sport



David SilvaIcon Sport



K√©vin De BruyneIcon Sport



Gabriel JesusIcon Sport



Raheem SterlingIcon Sport



Sergio AgueroIcon Sport

Manchester City: the possible eleven of the season




In football, everything goes fast, very fast. Only for the teammates of Yaya Tour√© this Saturday, it would have been better for the midfielder to take a little time before committing an ugly gesture on his direct opponent. After only ten seconds of play against Nantong Zhiyun, the former Manchester City kicked a defensive withdrawal, on his vis-√†-vis.




10 seconds of play




Kolo Toure, Yaya Toure + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

A bad gesture involving the intervention of the VAR by the referee in charge of the meeting, who after two minutes of play only logically decided to exclude the player 36 years.
Fortunately for his team, this game preceding a defeat (1-2) did not affect the outcome of the championship. Qingdao is crowned D2 champion and will evolve in D1 next season.
